title: A longitudinal qualitative study on physician experience in managing multimorbidity across the COVID-19 pandemic in Odisha, India
details: P Mahapatra, KC Sahoo, S Pati - Scientific Reports, 2024
abstract: While many studies have documented adverse impact of multiple chronic conditions or multimorbidity on COVID-19 outcomes in patients, there is scarcity of report on how physicians managed these patients. We investigated the experiences and …
